column5: Flying out of Red Lake 8/17-8/24 and wondered how the weather has been? Hot? mild? rain? Thanks
going to fly in with ontario wilderness vacations anybody been fishing with them
Check out www.ontarioweather.com, go to Red lake. I was there last week. Highest it got was probably 85. Looks hotter this week.
Jay,When you go "Way North" it's always blue skies and 70 degrees. I wish. Have a great time and realese those big fish unharmed.Sean
Jay,If you wouldn't mind, let me know how you do on Red Lake. I'm heading up there 3 weeks after you. Would be interested in where you had the best luck and what type of presentation. Thanks.Bill
